description: It's quite a trail.  The 3 km hike only levels off a couple of times so you can take a breather.  Within 1.5 km the elevation rises by 900 + feet so be prepare.  This trail takes you to the beautiful Champlain lookout which you can access by the Promenade de Gatineau parkway (by car), however, the feeling of your heart exiting your chest is much more exhilarating.
directions: Take St Raymond to Pink road and turn Right.  Drive for 825 meters to Ch. de la Montagne North and turn right again.  Drive for 14.2 km (13 minutes)where you will see a sharp curve to the left, which the parking lot in on the right (at the corner)
title: Eardley Escarpement - Gatineau Park
